user_query: Can you create a mindmap to help me organize my study plan for the Computer Science final exams? I want to break down each subject—like Data Structures, Operating Systems, and Algorithms—into their key subtopics. This will help me identify what to review in each subject and prioritize my focus areas.
requirements: Include major subjects: Data Structures, Operating Systems, Algorithms
Break each subject into core topics
Add revision priority for each topic
